pollination_catcher.name: Pollination Catcher
pollination_catcher.description: Move the collection net to capture as many pollen-carrying beetles as possible during the receptive window.

fertilizer_mixer.name: Fertilizer Mixer
fertilizer_mixer.description: Drag fertilizer bags until the combined dosage meets the target rate without exceeding tolerance.

harvest_timing.name: Harvest Timing
harvest_timing.description: Select ripe bunches showing the right color and loose fruit count while avoiding under- or overripe bunches.
